text: I tried a bunch of different apps. Usually when I want to code from the tablet I'm not doing any heavy lifting, so what worked the most for me was using <http://observablehq.com|observablehq.com>, or Coda by Panic (which is being discontinued) to just play around with some plain html/js/css or svgs. If you're interested, I can get into more details on what apps I tried and why they didn't work for me.
